widowmaker.name: Widowmaker Revolver
widowmaker.desc: A classic, high-caliber revolver, favored by independent contractors for its stopping power. Fires heavy projectile cartridges with a satisfying kick.

p11a.name: P11A Plasma Pistol
p11a.desc: A compact plasma gun emitting superheated bolts. Devastating at close range but drains its small energy cell quickly.

lasco25.name: LasCo-25 Laser Pistol
lasco25.desc: The ubiquitous sidearm for SEF personnel. Fires precision laser bursts, offering high accuracy and a rapid fire rate for sustained engagements.

harrison76.name: Harrison m.76 'Pocket Cannon'
harrison76.desc: A unique, heavily modified single-shot pistol chambered for 12-gauge shells. Unreliable beyond arm's reach, but delivers immense kinetic force point-blank.

mansfield-3.name: Mansfield Mk.III Laser Rifle
mansfield-3.desc: A robust and long-reaching laser rifle. Favored for its immense range, though its bulk can lead to slight inaccuracies in rapid deployment.

mansfield-6.name: Mansfield Mk.VI Laser Carbine
mansfield-6.desc: A lighter, more maneuverable variant of the Mansfield rifle. Excels in medium-range engagements, balancing power with ease of handling.

m51.name: M51 Coil Carbine
m51.desc: A military-grade coil gun that propels caseless projectiles at extreme velocities. Offers impressive stopping power at medium range, but its complex mechanism requires careful reloading.

knife_army.name: SEF Army Knife
knife_army.desc: The standard issue combat knife of the Space Expeditionary Force. Reliable and always ready for close-quarters engagements.

sword_army.name: SEF Officer's Sword
sword_army.desc: A ceremonial yet functional bladed weapon issued to SEF Non-Commissioned Officers. Heavier than a knife, delivering more forceful strikes.

grey_pulser.name: Grey Pulser Rifle
grey_pulser.desc: An alien energy rifle, standard issue for Grey soldiers. Fires rapid, focused laser pulses. Surprisingly accurate and quick to recharge.

blastcaster.name: Blastcaster Shotgun
blastcaster.desc: A heavy-duty combat shotgun, designed for close-quarters engagements. Unleashes a devastating spread of kinetic rounds.

vortexer.name: Vortexer E1 Energy Rifle
vortexer.desc: An experimental energy weapon that fires unstable plasma charges, capable of briefly disrupting enemy systems.
